"Backpack with built-in charging station" - A backpack with a built-in charging station that allows you to charge your phone or other electronic devices on the go.
"Smart backpack with GPS tracking" - A backpack with GPS tracking technology that allows you to track the location of your backpack and keep it safe from theft.
"Backpack with built-in Wi-Fi" - A backpack with built-in Wi-Fi that allows you to stay connected to the internet while on the go.
"Backpack with built-in water filtration system" - A backpack with a built-in water filtration system that allows you to safely drink water from any source.
"Backpack with built-in solar panels" - A backpack with built-in solar panels that allow you to charge your devices using the power of the sun.
